description:
This canyon is described in limited detail in Canyons Near Sydney by Rick Jamieson. Help the Australian canyoning community by contributing track notes to ropewiki.com

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

  • YouTube.com : Richard Pattison, Looking Glass Canyon movie.


Background

David Noble says: named by a Catholic Bushwalking Club party that used this creek as a (tricky) route to Twilight Canyon. i.e. they climbed up the canyon from the Wolgan. One member Steve "Gus" Henzel (also SUBW) lost his glasses on a ledge in the canyon - and was later seen looking for his glasses - hence the name. This was probably in 1980.
name: Looking Glass
